info.title: Bank Account
info.description:
An account that holds funds within a bank and is subject to additional deposits and withdrawals.
You can use this API to retrieve the UUID of a bank account by combinations of identifying elements of a bank account, like account number, bank key and country.

Comments:
The Bank Account Contract Processing service provider manages the various contracts that a bank has with its customers in connection with their bank accounts. Current Account Contract, Deposit Account Contract, and Loan Contract are types of Bank Account Contracts.

Remark:
The service Bank Account is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

x-sap-shortText: Query the internal ID of a bank account by combinations of identifying elements of a bank account using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Is a request to query bank accounts

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A UUID is a universal unique identifier of a bank account. 
Remark: The BankAccountUUID is required for the performant read of a bank account related entity because BankAccountUUID corresponds to CONTRACT_INT which is part of the primary index of the database table. GDT: NOSC_UUID

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BankAccounts HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

UUID.title: Universally unique identifier for a bank account contract payment transaction order request.

com.sap.gateway.default.bacpaymenttransa.title: Bank Account Contract Payment Transaction Order Request
com.sap.gateway.default.bacpaymenttransa.description: Request for a payment transaction for a order bank account contract.

ID.title: An identifier for a bank account entry.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.title: Bank Account Entry
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.description:
A Bank Account Entry is a balance-relevant entry for a Bank Account. A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals. 

Remark: Only bank account entries of BankAccountEntryType 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry), 2 (Bank Account Revenue Expense Entry) and 4 (Bank Account Tax Entry) are selected. 

Paging shall be supported for BankAccountEntry.

UUID.title: Universally unique identifier for a bank account prenote entry.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountpreno.title: Bank Account Prenote Entry
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountpreno.description: A Bank Account Prenote Entry represents a reservation on a Bank Account for either a debit or a credit amount. A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.

UUID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a standing payment instruction.

com.sap.gateway.default.standingpaymenti.title: Standing Payment Instruction
com.sap.gateway.default.standingpaymenti.description: An instruction to a bank to pay a fixed or variable amount from a bank account to one or multiple bank accounts at regular intervals; this includes bank transfers and direct debits

UUID.title: A UUID is a universal unique identifier of a bank account.
UUID.description: Remark: The BankAccountUUID is required for the performant read of a bank account related entity because BankAccountUUID corresponds to CONTRACT_INT which is part of the primary index of the database table. GDT: NOSC_UUID

InternalID.title: InternalID is a bank internal identifier for the bank account.
InternalID.description: Remark: The BankAccountInternalID is required for the performant read of a bank account related entity because BankAccountInternalID corresponds to CONTRACT_INT which is part of the primary index of the database table. GDT: BankAccountInternalID

ID.title:
Bank account number (Basic Bank Account Number, BBAN). An account number that is assigned by the account managing bank. 
It uniquely identifies a bank account in most countries only together with BankRoutingID and BankCountryCode.
ID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.
GDT: BankAccountID

StandardID.title: International bank account number (International Bank Account Number, IBAN).

CurrencyCode.title: A coded representation of the currency of the bank account.
CurrencyCode.description:
Remark: CurrencyCode is part of the identifiying elements of a bank account. 
CurrencyCode is only filled if the identification according the configuration contains CurrencyCode.
GDT: CurrencyCode

BankRoutingID.title: Number of the bank in a clearing system (see GDT BankRoutingID).

BankCountryCode.title:
Country in which the bank identified earlier goes about its business. 
If the bank is a member in a national clearing system, the country to which this clearing system belongs is entered here.
BankCountryCode.description:
Constraint: Only listID 3166-1 of listAgencyID 5 is supported.
GDT: CountryCode

BankAccountContractUUID.title: A bank internal identifier for the bank account contract.
BankAccountContractUUID.description: Remark: The BankAccountContractUUID will contain the same value as BankAccountUUID. GDT: NOSC_UUID

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccount.v000.title: Bank Account
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccount.v000.description:
A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.Remark: 
 Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. 
 Integrity Conditions: 
 The following combinations of properties for filtering are allowed: 
 a.) by Bank Account ID 
 - ID (mandatory) 
 - CurrencyCode (optional) 
 - BankRoutingID (optional) 
 - BankCountryCode (optional) 
 No other filter attributes are allowed. 
 b.) by Bank Account Standard ID 
 - StandardID (mandatory) 
 - CurrencyCode (optional) 
 c.) by BankAccountContractUUID 
 - BankAccountContractUUID (mandatory) 
 d.) by Bank Account Contract ID 
 - BankAccountContractID (mandatory)

UUID.title: A UUID is a universal unique identifier of a bank account.
UUID.description: Remark: The BankAccountUUID is required for the performant read of a bank account related entity because BankAccountUUID corresponds to CONTRACT_INT which is part of the primary index of the database table. GDT: NOSC_UUID
